commit.message:
auto merge of #20794 : sfackler/rust/trailing-attrs, r=alexcrichton

Closes #20711

+struct Foo;
+
+impl Foo {
+    fn foo() {}
+
+    #[stable]
+} //~ ERROR expected `fn`, found `}`
+
+fn main() {}
+
